chart.name: chart.unpaid.invoice.per.company
chart.title: Unpaid Invoice per Company
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.status) AS UnpaidInvoice, _party.name AS party, MONTH(self.onDate) AS month FROM Invoice self LEFT JOIN self.party AS _party WHERE self.onDate BETWEEN :fromDate AND :toDate AND self.status In ('2','1') GROUP BY _party.name,MONTH(self.onDate)

chart.name: chart.paid.invoice.per.category.per.product
chart.title: paid Invoice per Category per Product
chart.dataset:
SELECT Count(self.id) as count, _productCategory.name AS pcname, _product.name AS pname FROM Invoice AS self JOIN InvoiceLine AS _invoiceLine ON _invoiceLine.invoice = self.id JOIN Product AS _product ON _product.id = _invoiceLine.product JOIN ProductCategory AS _productCategory ON _productCategory.id = _product.category
WHERE self.status = '3' AND self.onDate > :fromDate AND self.onDate < :toDate GROUP BY _productCategory.name, _product.name

chart.name: chart.customer.per.state
chart.title: Customer per Sate
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(_party.name) AS Customer, _state.name AS state FROM Address self LEFT JOIN self.state AS _state LEFT JOIN self.party AS _party GROUP BY _state.name,_party.name

chart.name: chart.invoice.per.status
chart.title: Amount per Status
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.grossAmount) AS Amount, self.status AS status FROM Invoice self GROUP BY self.status

chart.name: chart.invoice.per.status.linechart
chart.title: Invoice per Status
chart.dataset: SELECT invoice.status as status, COUNT(invoice.id) as totalinvoice FROM Invoice as invoice GROUP BY status
